definitions.definition: A military man serving on horse, ( chiefly ) early modern cavalry officers who had abandoned the heavy armor of medieval knights .
A gallant : a sprightly young dashing military man.
A gentleman of the class of such officers , particularly :

subdefinitions.definition: A courtesan or noble under Charles I of England , particularly a royalist partisan during the English Civil War which ended his reign .

definitions.definition: A defensive work rising from a bastion , etc., and overlooking the surrounding area.

main_definition: ( historical ) A military man serving on horse, ( chiefly ) early modern cavalry officers who had abandoned the heavy armor of medieval knights .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A gallant : a sprightly young dashing military man.
A gentleman of the class of such officers , particularly :
( slang ) Someone with an uncircumcised penis .
( architecture ) A defensive work rising from a bastion , etc., and overlooking the surrounding area.
